name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.joblist.cache.size
description: Size of the job list cache

name: mapreduce.job.reducer.preempt.delay.sec
description:
The threshold (in seconds) after which an unsatisfied
      mapper request triggers reducer preemption when there is no anticipated
      headroom. If set to 0 or a negative value, the reducer is preempted as
      soon as lack of headroom is detected. Default is 0.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.renew-interval
description: The renewal interval for delegation token in milliseconds.

name: dfs.balancer.moverThreads
description:
Thread pool size for executing block moves.
    moverThreadAllocator

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.hard-kill-timeout-ms
description: Number of milliseconds to wait before the job client kills the application.

name: dfs.namenode.replication.work.multiplier.per.iteration
description:
*Note*: Advanced property. Change with caution.
    This determines the total amount of block transfers to begin in
    parallel at a DN, for replication, when such a command list is being
    sent over a DN heartbeat by the NN. The actual number is obtained by
    multiplying this multiplier with the total number of live nodes in the
    cluster. The result number is the number of blocks to begin transfers
    immediately for, per DN heartbeat. This number can be any positive,
    non-zero integer.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.rolledits.timeout
description: The timeout in seconds of calling rollEdits RPC on Active NN.
